strings.SS2_ITEM_BLEEDOUT_PICKUP: Upon dying, instead enter a bleedout state. Recharges over time.
strings.SS2_ITEM_BLEEDOUT_DESC: Upon taking <style=cIsHealth>lethal damage</style>, instead bleed out for <style=cIsHealth>100%</style> of your <style=cIsHealth>maximum health</style>. Recharges every <style=cIsUtility>4</style> minutes <style=cStack>(-20% per stack)</style>.
strings.SS2_ITEM_DEBUFFMISSILES_PICKUP: Chance to fire a void shard on hit. Chance increases per debuff.
strings.SS2_ITEM_DEBUFFMISSILES_DESC: For each <style=cIsDamage>debuff</style> on an enemy, gain a <style=cIsDamage>3%<style=cStack> (+1% per stack)</style></style> chance to fire a void shard for <style=cIsDamage>400%</style> TOTAL damage.
strings.SS2_ITEM_ELITEDAMAGEBONUS_PICKUP: Reduce the cooldowns of your skills when attacking elite monsters.
strings.SS2_ITEM_ELITEDAMAGEBONUS_DESC: Hitting an elite monster with a <style=cIsUtility>skill</style> has a <style=cIsUtility>30%</style> <style=cStack>(+10% per stack)</style> chance to <style=cIsUtility>reduce your cooldowns</style> by <style=cIsUtility>0.5</style> seconds.
strings.SS2_ITEM_HITLIST_PICKUP: Attack marked enemies to gain gold, and a permanent damage boost on kill.
strings.SS2_ITEM_HITLIST_DESC: Every <style=cIsUtility>30</style> <style=cStack>(-20% per stack)</style> seconds, <style=cIsDamage>mark</style> an enemy. Killing <style=cIsDamage>marked</style> enemies increases your <style=cIsDamage>damage permanently</style> by <style=cIsDamage>2%</style>.
strings.SS2_ITEM_ITEMONBOSSKILL_DESC: Bosses drop an <style=cIsUtility>item</style> on kill. <style=cStack>(Item rarity increases per stack)</style>
strings.SS2_ITEM_ITEMONELITEKILL_DESC: Elites have a <style=cIsUtility>6%</style><style=cStack> (+2% per stack)</style> chance to drop an <style=cIsUtility>item</style> on kill.
strings.SS2_ITEM_MAXHPONKILL_PICKUP: Killing an enemy permanently increases your maximum health.
strings.SS2_ITEM_MAXHPONKILL_DESC: Killing an enemy increases your <style=cIsHealing>health permanently</style> by <style=cIsHealing>2</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack)</style>.
strings.SS2_ITEM_OPTIONFROMCHEST_PICKUP: Chests grant a choice between 3 items.
strings.SS2_ITEM_OPTIONFROMCHEST_DESC: Chests have a <style=cIsUtility>50%</style> chance to grant a choice between <style=cIsUtility>3</style> items. <style=cStack>(Item rarity increases per stack)</style>
strings.SS2_ITEM_SCRAPFROMCHEST_DESC: Chests have a <style=cIsUtility>33%</style><style=cStack> (+11% per stack) </style>chance to drop extra <style=cIsUtility>scrap</style>.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SHELLPIECE_PICKUP: Block lethal damage. Recharges each stage.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SHELLPIECE_DESC: Upon taking <style=cIsHealth>lethal damage</style>, instead become <style=cIsUtility>invulnerable</style> for <style=cIsUtility>3</style> seconds. Recharges each stage.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SHIELDGATE_PICKUP: Killing an enemy permanently increases your shield.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SHIELDGATE_DESC: Killing an enemy increases your <style=cIsUtility>shield permanently</style> by <style=cIsUtility>2</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack)</style>.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SNAKEEYES_PICKUP: Shrines grant permanent critical chance. Critical chance over 100% has a chance to reduce your cooldowns.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SNAKEEYES_DESC: Using a Shrine increases your <style=cIsDamage>critical chance permanently</style> by <style=cIsDamage>2%<style=cStack> (+1% per stack)</style></style>. <style=cIsDamage>Critical chance</style> over <style=cIsDamage>100%</style> grants a chance to <style=cIsUtility>reduce your cooldowns</style> by <style=cIsUtility>1</style> second.
